title: Aaron Turner from Isis/Hydrahead Records
itunes:title: Aaron Turner from Isis/Hydrahead Records
description:
Aaron Turner is the vocalist/guitarist for the band Isis as well as the owner of Hydrahead Records. I was ecstatic that he agreed to appearing on the show and pestered him about perception, expectations and why we find ourselves always trying to please our parents. Brought to you in conjunction by Propertyofzack.com 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
